entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
